home.title: Welcome
home.introduction: This is an introduction in Russian.

about.title: About
about.introduction: This page is made to give you more informations. RU
about.main_description: In the summer camp Embassy English held in Kuala Lumpur, the capital of Malaysia, teenagers immerse themselves in the interactive reality show with its daily quests and team buildings made to improve their English language proficiency, as well as social and communication skills. English express learning courses will significantly improve language proficiency while leisure weekend days will be filled with exciting trips and excursions.

b10.description: All of our boarding and summer camps are developed with these principles and values in mind to deliver holistic skill, body and mind development to all the participants.

list.head: We believe education environment should be safe, engaging and fun and build all our camps with this principle as a base component.
We believe that sports play a very important role in teenage development.
list.body: It's scientifically proven that an active lifestyle makes a happier, more productive individuals. Having moderate sport activity modules and active team buildings on a daily basis make the camp time absolutely awesome for participants.

list.head: We believe that a good camp leader is our road to success
list.body: We find professional leaders with big hears and provide them further training to make the camps an absolute success. Most of our camp leaders have worked with us for many years and absolutely enjoy to see results in youth they develop.

list.head: We believe that social skills and ability to communicate effectively are crucial in today's society
list.body: We include components that promote these abilities in all of our boarding and summer camps.

list.head: We believe in balanced nutrition and make sure that buffet tables in our boarding camps are filled with a good variety of healthy foods.

form.contact_form_complete: Thank you for your enquiry! Our consultant from the Educational Departament will get back to you in awhile.

landingCommon.about_school_accommodation: At King Henry VIII school there are two separate student dormitories, one for boys and one for girls. Several types of accommodation are available: single, double, triple and quad rooms. Single and double rooms are equipped with private bathroom. Triple and quadruple rooms have a bathroom located on the floor. Each floor has:
landingCommon.about_school_desc: The International British School, King Henry VIII College Malaysia. The parent school is Christ College Brecon and it has almost a 5-century history. It is one of the most prestigious educational institutions in the UK. The branch of the school in Malaysia was opened in 2018 in the safe and modern hi-tech town of Cyberjaya. The town is only a 25-minute drive from Kuala Lumpur or the airport. The school is a well-known educational institution with an excellent reputation both in the UK and Malaysia.

security_blocks.body: Accompanying children by group leader from the airport
Two separate student dormitories, one for boys and one for girls
Closed guarded territory on the basis of the British School
Accompanying children by camp counselors during excursions and walks around the city

prizes.main_desc: Contest winners get gold coins (for 150 points) and silver coins (for 100 points) as prizes. Children can exchange the coins to various services, goods or souvenirs at the end of the programme. The coins are the currency of the camp and like real money can be exchanged, borrowed or even lost.
prizes.main_desc2: Only those children who have the largest number of unspent coins earned during the contests by the end of the month will be able to get prizes. A flight in a three-seater helicopter above Kuala Lumpur and Petronas Twin Towers.

first.header: Helicopter flight or trip to Malaysia
first.body: A flight in a helicopter above Kuala Lumpur and Petronas Twin Towers. Or Holiday in Kuala Lumpur for 6 days 5 nights for parents

second.header: Dinner in KL Tower or trip to Malaysia
second.body: Dinner for 2 in revolving Restaurant in KL Tower. Or Holiday in Kuala Lumpur for 4 days 3 nights for parents

third.header: Twin Towers visit or trip to Malaysia
third.body: Ticket for 2 pax to Petronas Twin Towers, Bridge on 41th floor and observation deck on 86th floor. Or Holiday in Kuala Lumpur for 3 days 2 nights for parents

b5.desc: At Embassy English Summer language camp in Malaysia your child will be immersed in an interactive reality show full of lots of challenges and team-building activities aimed to improve their English. The interactive course breaks down the psychological barrier to speaking freely through an exciting programme that also develops intellect and leadership skills. Your children will enjoy exciting sightseeing trips at the weekends, too.

b13.header: Act today to make your child successful tomorrow
b13.desc: Apply for a free consultation to help you choose your suitable options. It will only take 20 minutes. Leave a query and our manager will contact you.

comments.name: Alexandra (Rostov, Russia)
comments.text: I could hardly recognize my child! He became more independent and more eager to learn English. School teachers have noticed that Arthur considerably improved his English

comments.name: Guzel (Kazan, Russia)
comments.text: My son spent a wonderful month without computer games. He made friends with children from other countries, and now they keep in touch over Skype and speak English.

comments.name: Asiya (Almaty, Kazakhstan)
comments.text: My child’s safety is top priority for me. At Embassy English camp group leaders were staying with children around the clock, and uploaded photos of how the children spent the day to the parents’ online group

comments.name: Dinara (Tashkent, Uzbekistan)
comments.text: It was for the first time that my daughter attended the camp and she was so much impressed by her stay there!

reasons_to_join.head: Motivation
reasons_to_join.body: Building motivation is fun!  We use systematic self-monitoring techniques to guide campers to better habits that also builds motivation. There is a daily reward system giving out to the winner team by point basis for team buildings and games. Participant needs to accumulate the points in order to win the grand prize. They are rewarding in the form of "gold" (150 points), "silver" (100 points) and "bronze" (50 points). However, they are able to spend the points during the camp, till the end of the day, Grand Prize only goes to the highest points of the first three teams. This point system able to test their capability on analyzing and also encourage them to learn more.

reasons_to_join.head: Improve English level
reasons_to_join.body: Our highly effective English learning program is devised by professional teachers from Australia, America, Britain and Canada, and they help the children to advance and develop their English during their stay at the summer camp. The learning process at the camp is one of interactive and creative activity in an international environment of friendly peers. Students will cover one level of English within one month at the camp, which normally takes them one academic year at school.

reasons_to_join.head: Safe country
reasons_to_join.body: Malaysia is one of the safest countries in the world to visit. There are no natural disasters like earthquakes, floods or volcano eruptions. Malaysia is a Muslim country, but this does not mean that other religions or cultures are afflicted. Chinese, Indian, and Korean people make it a country of cultural diversity turning Malaysia into a truly multicultural destination.

reasons_to_join.head: British School
reasons_to_join.body: The International British School, King Henry VIII College Malaysia. The parent school is Christ College Brecon and it has almost a 5-century history. It is one of the most prestigious educational institutions in the UK. The branch of the school in Malaysia was opened in 2018 in the safe and modern hi-tech town of Cyberjaya.

reasons_to_join.head: Business trainings
reasons_to_join.body: Teaching children about business at a young age is important for the future of business as a whole. When kids are taught the specific lessons of money management and organizational skills, they can apply their skills towards building a business for themselves, but they can also apply the skills they have learned to their personal lives. Business trainers will teach them in an interactive process the most important and fundamental business skills and ideas.

reasons_to_join.head: Physically activities
reasons_to_join.body: Fact that teenagers spend a lot of time indoor and mostly sit in front of electronic devices. Summer camp gives a wonderful opportunity to spend one month in active mode. In our programs, participants will join sports activities such as swimming, football, tennis, gym, dancing, and active games.

reasons_to_join.head: Develop leader skills
reasons_to_join.body: Summer camp Embassy English combines unforgettable holidays, interactive learning of English and development of skills that every successful person should have. In our camp, children learn to set the right goals and clear understanding of what they want from life.

reasons_to_join.head: Grow more independent
reasons_to_join.body: The camp is a perfect place for children to learn to be self-driven and independent without the supervision of parents or teachers. Mastering self-management skills in the safe environment of the camp enables the children to discover new spheres of interest.

reasons_to_join.head: Learn social skills
reasons_to_join.body: Nowadays, virtual communication has almost replaced live contact. Thus, many children become experts in social media communication while losing face-to-face communication skills. At the camp teenagers join a friendly community, where each person has to listen to others and respect them. Staying together children learn to work in a team, resolve misunderstandings and feel the importance and value of live communication. Children from different countries come to the camp, so they learn to overcome cross-cultural barriers and bridge the differences in the world vision.

reasons_to_join.head: Amazing prizes
reasons_to_join.body: Participants able to spend their point on exchanging with a local souvenir to a Ferrari ride in Singapore or enjoy a flying experience of 4-seaters Cessna private plane around Petronas Twin Tower. There are many more prizes giving out during the camp, all information will be shown upon arrival.

reasons_to_join.head: Make true friends
reasons_to_join.body: Camp is the place where kids make their very best friends. Free from the social expectations pressuring them at school, camp encourages kids to relax and make friends easily. All the fun at camp draws everyone together.

items.body: Fireflies River and Monkey Hill tour

b1.capture: Invest in your child’s future right now to make your child happy and successful!

b5_2.header: After Smart camp participants will have the following skills

items.head: Touch typing
items.body: Learn touch typing with 10 fingers! Increase your typing speed 2 to 5 times.

items.head: Mental arithmetic
items.body: A unique methodology for developing the intellect. Our training improves both perception and the processing of information while developing both brain hemispheres simultaneously.

items.head: Speed reading
items.body: Children will start reading 2-3 times faster than before and understand texts easier! Learn self-paced reading.

items.head: English Language
items.body: Improve their English in an immersive language environment. Our new teaching method for FUN ENGLISH.

s1.header: Accommodation in a summer language camp
s1.description:
In the Smart Camp summer camp program, we offer accommodation in the new Komune residence, located in the prestigious area of Kuala Lumpur, 2-bed accommodation in a room with two separate rooms.
It features a rooftop outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi. The apartments come with a kitchenette and a large TV with international channels.
The spacious bathroom includes a hairdryer and toiletries.

b9.header: Check out our video of Smart Camp 2019

b13.desc: Hundreds of children have mastered touch typing, speed-reading and the basics of mental arithmetic in our summer camps in 2015-2018. Don’t let your child miss the chance to develop these skills, too. It will save the child plenty of time in the fast-paced modern lifestyle.

index.title: Summer camps Embassy Camp in Malaysia and Singapore
index.description: Language and summer camps in Malaysia and Singapore Embassy Camps are aimed at holistic development of children and teenagers. Combining holidays abroad with teaching in English, we present all the key components brought to the participants via interactive and fun environment filled with games, activities and team buildings.

b5.desc: Learning principles of our camps are based on holistic improvement of an individual's mental, physical and social skills. Regardless of the camp program all the components are brought to participants via interactive and fun environment filled with games and activities.

b6.header: Skills learned and improved in our summer camps
b6.body: Our Summer Camps are holistic programs focused on the improvement of kid's mental, physical, social and leadership skills which are so important in the modern world

b7.header: Custom Summer Camps for your group
b7.body: Haven’t found desired dates? Good news: it’s summer all year round in Malaysia and Singapore. Get in touch for a tailor made Summer Camp for your group and our professional educators will be happy to help you to create a camp for any dates needed.

s1.body: Malaysia and Singapore have lots of sites for curious minds. We fill our summer camps and boarding camps with guided excursions to visit the most famous landmarks around.

s2.body: Learning through experience is the key component of our camps. We arrange daily evening activities that develop confidence, public speaking skills, teamwork, decision making and other qualities in the participants of our summer camps.

comments.mainHeader: What do parents say about our summer camps?

b1.body: The website embassy.camp is a part of Asian Guides® websites’ group which provides travel and ground services in Southeast Asia. Trademark Asian Guides® belongs to international travel company Embassy Alliance Travel with offices located in Malaysia and Singapore.
